attributes.action: keep aquarius self help group going
attributes.additional_details: Aquarius,is run by the primary care trust,to help addicts of drug,alcohol,and gambling mis-use,On dec 1st 2011,Aquarius will stop trading,and group called Swanswell,based in the metro court West Bromwich,will take over,as a member of aquarius myself,and a number of others,we would like to see our self help group meetings continue,when this takeover has been finalised
